snippet: A collaboration between the National Audubon Society, a gallerist, and business and property owners seeks to populate neighborhoods with paintings of North American birds threatened by climate change.
lead_paragraph: A collaboration between the National Audubon Society, a gallerist, and business and property owners seeks to populate neighborhoods with paintings of North American birds threatened by climate change.

headline.main: Audubon Mural Project Brings 5-Story Flock to Uptown Manhattan
